languages.text: "Итак, к делу. Культ Последнего восхода. Безумцы распространяют свое еретическое учение среди обитателей Простора и толкают их на преступления против Трона и Человечества. Одно из таких преступлений свершилось на территории твоего протектората. Лорд-инквизитор счел необходимым, чтобы Вольного Торговца, котор{mf|ый|ая} направляется в затронутый скверной регион, сопровождал один из его аколитов. Вдобавок мне нужно встретиться с одним из моих соглядатаев на мире-столице твоего протектората".

traits.locale_text: "Итак, к делу. Культ последнего восхода. Безумцы распространяют свое еретическое учение среди обитателей Коронуса и толкают их на преступления против Трона и Человечества. Одно из таких преступлений свершилось на территории твоей торговой империи. Лорд-инквизитор счел необходимым, чтобы Вольного Торговца, котор{mf|ый|ая} направляется в затронутый скверной регион, сопровождал один из его аколитов. Вдобавок мне нужно встретиться с одним из моих соглядатаев на мире-столице твоей торговой империи".

languages.text: "To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your protectorate. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your domain."
languages.original_text: "Итак, к делу. Культ Последнего восхода. Безумцы распространяют свое еретическое учение среди обитателей Простора и толкают их на преступления против Трона и Человечества. Одно из таких преступлений свершилось на территории твоего протектората. Лорд-инквизитор счел необходимым, чтобы Вольного Торговца, котор{mf|ый|ая} направляется в затронутый скверной регион, сопровождал один из его аколитов. Вдобавок мне нужно встретиться с одним из моих соглядатаев на мире-столице твоего протектората".

traits.locale_text: "To business, then. Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the Koronus denizens and instigate crimes against the Throne and Mankind. One such crime took place in the territory of your merchant empire. Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have the Rogue Trader heading into the corrupted region be accompanied by one of his acolytes."

"To business, then. Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the Koronus denizens and instigate crimes against the Throne and Mankind. One such crime took place in the territory of your merchant empire. Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have the Rogue Trader heading into the corrupted region be accompanied by one of his acolytes."

"To business, then. Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the Koronus denizens and instigate crimes against the Throne and Mankind. One such crime took place in the territory of your merchant empire. Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have the Rogue Trader heading into the corrupted region be accompanied by one of his acolytes. And besides, I need to meet one of my observers on the capital world of your merchant empire."

"To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your trade empire. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your trade empire."

"To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your trade empire. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your trade empire."

"To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your protectorate. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your domain."

languages.text: «Vayamos al grano. El Culto del Amanecer Final. Una secta de lunáticos que predica sus herejías entre los habitantes de la Extensión de Koronus e instiga crímenes contra el Trono y contra la Humanidad. Uno de dichos crímenes tuvo lugar en su protectorado. El Lord Inquisidor considera esencial que uno de sus acólitos acompañe a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en su viaje por esta región corrupta. También debo reunirme con uno de mis observadores en el mundo capital de sus dominios».
languages.original_text: "To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your protectorate. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your domain."

traits.locale_text: «Vayamos al grano. El Culto del Amanecer Final. Una secta de lunáticos que predica sus herejías entre los habitantes de la Extensión de Koronus e instiga crímenes contra el Trono y contra la Humanidad. El Lord Inquisidor considera esencial que uno de sus acólitos acompañe a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en su viaje por esta región corrupta. También debo reunirme con uno de mis observadores en el mundo capital de su imperio comercial».

languages.text: “那就说正事吧，是关于‘终末黎明’这个邪教。这群疯子在科罗努斯扩区的居民中宣扬他们的异端邪说，煽动对黄金王座与人类帝国的犯罪行为，这种罪行也曾在你的王朝领地之中发生过。大审判官大人认为，必须派遣他手下其中一位侍仆，陪同行商浪人一起前往腐化的地区。此外，我也需要前往你的首都世界，与我的线人见个面。”
languages.original_text: "To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your protectorate. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your domain."

traits.locale_text: “那就说正事吧，是关于‘终末黎明’这个邪教。这群疯子在科罗努斯星域的居民中宣扬他们的异端邪说，煽动对黄金王座与人类帝国的犯罪行为，这种罪行也曾在你的贸易帝国中发生过。审判长大人认为，必须派遣他手下其中一位侍仆，陪同行商浪人一起前往腐化的地区。此外，我也需要前往你的贸易帝国的首都世界，与我的线人见个面。”

languages.text: 「仕事のためですよ。最後の夜明け教団。頭のおかしい奴らがコロヌス・エクスパンスの民達に異端の教義を説き、王族と一般市民に対する犯罪行為をけしかけているのです。そういう犯罪のひとつが陛下の保護領で発生した。ロード・インクィジターは、毒されたエリアへの旅路にはアコライトのひとりを自由開拓者に同行させる必要があるとお考えです。我も陛下の領地の首都惑星で監視員のひとりと会わなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your protectorate. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your domain."

traits.locale_text: 「仕事のためですよ。最後の夜明け教団。頭のおかしい奴らがコロヌス・エクスパンスの民達に異端の教義を説き、王族と一般市民に対する犯罪行為をけしかけているのです。そういう犯罪のひとつが陛下の保護領で発生した。ロード・インクィジターは、毒されたエリアへの旅路にはアコライトのひとりを自由開拓者に同行させる必要があるとお考えです。我も陛下の領地の首都惑星で監視員のひとりと会わなければなりません」

languages.text: "Gut, reden wir übers Geschäft. Den Kult der letzten Dämmerung. Die Verrückten predigen ihre ketzerische Lehre vor den Bewohnern der Koronus-Ausdehnung und stacheln sie zu Verbrechen gegen den Thron und die Menschheit an. Eines dieser Verbrechen wurde in Eurem Protektorat verübt. Der Großinquisitor hält es für erforderlich, dass einer seiner Gefolgsleute den Freihändler auf seiner Reise in die korrumpierte Region begleitet. Außerdem muss ich mich mit einem meiner Beobachter auf der Hauptwelt Eures Herrschaftsbereichs treffen."
languages.original_text: "To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your protectorate. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your domain."

traits.locale_text: "Gut, reden wir übers Geschäft. Den Kult der letzten Dämmerung. Die Verrückten predigen ihre ketzerische Lehre vor den Bewohnern der Koronus Expanse und stacheln sie zu Verbrechen gegen den Thron und die Menschheit an. Eines dieser Verbrechen wurde in Eurem Handelsimperium verübt. Der Großinquisitor hält es für erforderlich, dass einer seiner Gefolgsleute den Freihändler auf seiner Reise in die korrumpierte Region begleitet. Außerdem muss ich mit mich einem meiner Beobachter auf der Hauptwelt Eures Handelsimperiums treffen."

languages.text: « Bien, parlons de ce qui m'amène ici : le Culte de l'Aube finale. Ces fous prêchent leur doctrine hérétique aux habitants des Étendues de Koronus et les incitent à commettre des crimes contre le Trône et l'humanité. Un tel crime ayant lieu dans votre protectorat, le seigneur inquisiteur a jugé nécessaire que l'un de ses acolytes vous accompagne au cours de votre traversée de la région corrompue. Je dois également rencontrer l'un de mes observateurs dans le monde-capitale de votre domaine. »
languages.original_text: "To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your protectorate. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your domain."

traits.locale_text: « Bien, parlons de ce qui m'amène ici : le Culte de l'Aube finale. Ces fous prêchent leur doctrine hérétique aux habitants des Étendues de Koronus et les incitent à commettre des crimes contre le Trône et l'humanité. Un tel crime ayant lieu dans votre empire commercial, le seigneur inquisiteur a jugé nécessaire que l'un de ses acolytes vous accompagne au cours de votre traversée de la région corrompue. Je dois également rencontrer l'un de mes observateurs dans le monde capitale de votre empire. »

languages.text: "İş konuşalım o hâlde. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı. Bu akıl yoksunları, kâfir doktrinlerini Koronus Enginliği'nin dört bir yanına yayıp Taht'a ve İnsanlığa karşı suçlar işliyor. Bu suçların bir tanesi de senin protektoranda işlendi. Lord Engizisyoncu, yozlaşmış bölgelere doğru olan yolculuğu sırasında havarilerinden birinin Hür Tacir'e eşlik etmesinin gerekli olduğunu düşündü. Ayrıca diyarının başdünyasında gözlemcilerimden biriyle görüşmem gerek."
languages.original_text: "To business, then. The Cult of the Final Dawn. The madmen preach their heretical doctrine among the denizens of the Koronus Expanse and instigate crimes against the Throne and Humanity. One such crime took place in your protectorate. The Lord Inquisitor considered it necessary to have one of his acolytes accompany the Rogue Trader on the voyage into the corrupted region. I also need to meet with one of my observers on the capital world of your domain."

traits.locale_text: "İş konuşalım o hâlde. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı. Bu akıl yoksunları, kâfir doktrinlerini Koronus Enginliği boyunca yayıyor ve Taht'a ve İnsanlığa karşı suçlar işliyorlar. Bu suçların bir tanesi de senin protektoranda meydana geldi. Lord Engizisyoncu, yozlaşmış bölgelere doğru olan yolculuğu sırasında Hür Tacir'e, havarilerinden birinin eşlik etmesinin gerekli olduğunu düşündü. Ayrıca diyarının başdünyasında gözlemcilerimden biriyle görüşmem gerek."
